statements: SELECT employee_id, material_name FROM employee_training_materials WHERE completed = true;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM employee_training_materials WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'SQL%';
SELECT employee_id, material_id, material_name FROM employee_training_materials ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT material_name, progress FROM employee_training_materials WHERE completed = false ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT employee_id, material_name, progress FROM employee_training_materials WHERE completed = true ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT material_name, completed, employee_id FROM employee_training_materials WHERE progress >= 50;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND progress < 100 ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, material_name, progress FROM employee_training_materials WHERE completed = false AND progress IS NOT NULL ORDER BY employee_id ASC, progress DESC;
SELECT employee_id, material_name, completed FROM employee_training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, progress_percentage FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Tutorial';
SELECT material_name FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT employee_id, material_type FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, material_name, material_type FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials WHERE employee_id = 1001 ORDER BY material_type ASC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(progress_percentage) AS avg_progress FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(progress_percentage) > 70;

SELECT employee_id, material_name, material_type, progress_percentage FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video' AND progress_percentage < 100 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC, material_name ASC;

SELECT emp.employee_id, mat.material_name, prog.completion_status FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials mat JOIN EmployeeTrainingProgress prog ON mat.employee_id = prog.employee_id AND mat.material_name = 'SQL Basics' AND prog.completion_status = true ORDER BY emp.employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT id, title, content FROM training_materials ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title FROM training_materials WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, content FROM training_materials WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, join_date FROM employees ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT e.name, etp.progress, tm.title FROM employees e JOIN employee_training_progress etp ON e.id = etp.employee_id JOIN training_materials tm ON etp.material_id = tm.id WHERE etp.progress > 0.5;

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, tm.title AS material_title FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_training_progress etp ON e.id = etp.employee_id LEFT JOIN training_materials tm ON etp.material_id = tm.id WHERE etp.progress IS NULL;

SELECT e.id, e.name, COUNT(etp.id) AS total_materials_completed FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_training_progress etp ON e.id = etp.employee_id WHERE etp.progress = 1 GROUP BY e.id, e.name ORDER BY total_materials_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrainingMaterials;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees;
SELECT material_title, material_type FROM TrainingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProgress ORDER BY progress_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, material_id, progress_status FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM TrainingMaterials WHERE material_type='Video';
SELECT material_title, material_type FROM TrainingMaterials WHERE material_id > 100 ORDER BY material_title DESC;

SELECT m.material_title, e.employee_name FROM TrainingMaterials m JOIN EmployeeProgress ep ON m.material_id = ep.material_id JOIN Employees e ON ep.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE ep.progress_status='Completed';
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM Employees e JOIN Departments d ON e.department = d.department_name WHERE e.email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS employee_count FROM Departments d LEFT JOIN Employees e ON d.department_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY d.department_name HAVING employee_count > 5 ORDER BY employee_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM employee_training_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department='Engineering' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department, employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_name;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date ASC LIMIT 5;
